resources.string: create table TBL_CONTENTS ( id integer primary key autoincrement, SECTION integer not null, SEQUENCE integer not null, TYPE text not null, COMMON0 text, COMMON1 text, COMMON2 text, VALUE0 text, VALUE1 text, VALUE2 text, VALUE3 text, VALUE4 text, VALUE5 text, VALUE6 text, VALUE7 text, VALUE8 text, VALUE9 text, CONTENTS_TEXT text, unique(SECTION, SEQUENCE))

select SECTION, SEQUENCE, TYPE, COMMON0, COMMON1, COMMON2, VALUE0, VALUE1, VALUE2, VALUE3, VALUE4, VALUE5, VALUE6, VALUE7, VALUE8, VALUE9, CONTENTS_TEXT from TBL_CONTENTS where SECTION = ? order by SECTION, SEQUENCE
select SECTION, SEQUENCE, TYPE, COMMON0, COMMON1, COMMON2, VALUE0, VALUE1, VALUE2, VALUE3, VALUE4, VALUE5, VALUE6, VALUE7, VALUE8, VALUE9, CONTENTS_TEXT from TBL_CONTENTS order by SECTION, SEQUENCE
